## normRange() function

Yields sequence of `n+1` monotonically increasing numbers in the closed interval (0.0 .. 1.0). If `n <= 0`<!-- -->, yields nothing.

```
[...normRange(4)]
// [0, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1.0]

```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function normRange(n: number, inclLast?: boolean): Generator<number, void, unknown>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  n | <code>number</code> | number of steps |
|  inclLast | <code>boolean</code> | include last value (i.e. <code>1.0</code>) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Generator<number, void, unknown>`
